<style id="kbt-atmosphere-bg-style-inline-css">
.kbt-atmosphere-bg {
  position: relative;
}
.kbt-atmosphere-bg.no-proxy > .layers {
  visibility: inherit;
}
.kbt-atmosphere-bg > .layers {
  visibility: hidden;
}
.kbt-atmosphere-bg > .layers .layer {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: -100000;
  left: calc(50% + var(--layer-x));
  top: calc(50% + var(--layer-y));
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  width: var(--layer-w);
  height: var(--layer-h);
  background-color: var(--layer-color);
  border-radius: 100%;
  filter: blur(var(--layer-blur));
  opacity: var(--layer-opacity);
}

#atmosphere-bg .layer {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: -100000;
  background-color: var(--layer-color);
  border-radius: 100%;
  filter: blur(var(--layer-blur));
  opacity: var(--layer-opacity);
}/*# sourceMappingURL=style.css.map */
</style>
<style id="kbt-connector-bg-style-inline-css">
.kbt-connector-bg {
  position: relative;
}
.kbt-connector-bg > .connector {
  left: var(--connector-x);
  top: var(--connector-y);
  position: absolute;
  z-index: -100000;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  pointer-events: none;
}
.kbt-connector-bg > .connector .line {
  width: var(--connector-length);
  height: 2px;
  position: absolute;
  left: calc(50% - var(--connector-length) / 2);
  top: -1px;
  background: linear-gradient(to right, transparent 0%, var(--connector-color) var(--connector-gradient-midpoint-offset), transparent 100%);
}
.kbt-connector-bg > .connector .line-1 {
  transform: rotate(var(--connector-angle-line-1)) translateX(var(--connector-intersection));
}
.kbt-connector-bg > .connector .line-2 {
  transform: rotate(var(--connector-angle-line-2)) translateX(var(--connector-intersection));
}/*# sourceMappingURL=style.css.map */
</style>
<style id="kbt-slider-style-inline-css">

  --slide-padding: 50px;
  --slide-border-radius: 24px;
  position: relative;
  min-height: var(--slide-min-height);
}

  }

          user-select: auto;

.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kbt-slider-slide,
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide {

.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kbt-slider-slide > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kb-row-layout-wrap > .kt-row-layout-overlay,
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kb-row-layout-wrap > .kt-row-layout-overlay {

.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kb-row-layout-wrap > .kt-row-column-wrap {
  padding-left: 0;
  padding-right: 0;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide {
  display: block;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.bg {
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: #000;
  border-radius: var(--slide-border-radius);
  padding: 0;
  overflow: hidden;

.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.bg > .slick-list > .slick-track,

  height: 100%;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.bg > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kb-row-layout-wrap > .kt-row-column-wrap {
  display: none;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-list {
  overflow: visible;
  width: 100%;
  order: -1;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide {
  transform: translateX(20px);
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide.slick-current {
  transform: none;
  transition: opacity 0.5s, transform 0.5s ease-out !important;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide.prev-slide {
  transform: translateX(-60px);
  transition: opacity 0.5s, transform 0.5s ease-out !important;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kb-row-layout-wrap {
  background-image: none;

.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kb-row-layout-wrap > .kt-row-layout-overlay, .kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-list > .slick-track > .kbt-slider-slide > .acf-innerblocks-container > .kb-row-layout-wrap::after {

.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-arrow {
  padding: 0;
  background-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 0;
  margin-right: 8px;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-arrow:hover svg .bg {
  opacity: 0.25;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-arrow svg .bg {
  transition: opacity 0.2s;
}
.kbt-slider > .acf-innerblocks-container.fg > .slick-counter {
  margin-left: 16px;
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.2;
  padding-top: 12px;

<h2 class="kt-adv-heading2_438a24-0a wp-block-kadence-advancedheading" data-kb-block="kb-adv-heading2_438a24-0a"><span class="kb-adv-text-inner">Who we are</span></h2>


<p class="has-text-align-center has-medium-font-size">Bluetooth® is more than just a technology. The Bluetooth Special Interest Group (SIG) is a community of some of the most inventive minds and organizations with the shared vision of creating a better world through connection. Together, we advance, protect, and promote Bluetooth® technology, the global standard for connection.</p>


<div class="kb-row-layout-wrap kb-row-layout-id2_a0e5c4-89 alignnone wp-block-kadence-rowlayout"><div class="kt-row-column-wrap kt-has-3-columns kt-row-layout-equal kt-tab-layout-inherit kt-mobile-layout-row kt-row-valign-top">

<div class="wp-block-kadence-column kadence-column2_c3ad33-9f"><div class="kt-inside-inner-col">
<div class="wp-block-kadence-column kadence-column2_171547-4e aos-init" data-aos="fade-up"><div class="kt-inside-inner-col">
<figure class="wp-block-image size-full is-resized wp-duotone-rgb0130252-rgb0130252-1"><img decoding="async" src="https://www.bluetooth.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Bluetooth-IconsAdvance.svg" alt="" class="wp-image-245275" style="width:90px"></figure>



<h2 class="kt-adv-heading2_8ba89f-55 wp-block-kadence-advancedheading" data-kb-block="kb-adv-heading2_8ba89f-55">Advance</h2>



<p>We are an international standards development organization. We continually enhance Bluetooth® technology by creating new specifications that push the boundaries of what’s possible and help make the world a better place.</p>
</div></div>
</div></div>
